intro.title: Your perfect getaway
intro.description: Designed for those seeking a comfortable, practical, and aesthetic stay. The complex brings together equipped apartments, functional amenities, and a peaceful environment, achieving the perfect balance between location, rest, and experience.

architecture.title: Designed for rest, crafted for enjoyment
architecture.description: A uniquely designed building in west Buenos Aires. Curved lines, large windows, and spaces that dialogue with natural light. Just 100 meters from Acceso Oeste highway.

confort.name: Confort Category
confort.description: Features 1 bed (2.00 x 2.00 meters), bedding, individually controlled heating/cooling, 43" LED Smart TV. Full kitchen with refrigerator, oven, stovetop, microwave, coffee maker, milk frother, kettle, toaster, and complete dinnerware. Intercom and free WiFi. Weekly cleaning service included. Bright, spacious, and comfortable spaces. This category includes a large shared patio.

superior.name: Superior Category
superior.description: Features a kitchen-dining area and bedroom, 1 bed (2.00 x 2.00 meters), bedding, individually controlled heating/cooling, 43" LED Smart TV. Full kitchen with refrigerator, oven, stovetop, microwave, coffee maker, milk frother, kettle, toaster, and complete dinnerware. Weekly cleaning service included, additional cleaning on request for a fee. Spacious closets, intercom, and free WiFi. Bright, spacious, and comfortable spaces. Includes large shared patio.

executive.name: Executive Suite
executive.shortDesc: 2 bedrooms, living room, and maximum comfort
executive.description: Features a kitchen-dining area and 2 bedrooms with TV, 1 bed (2.00 x 2.00 meters), 1 single bed (1.20 x 1.90 meters), living room with sofa and TV, 1 full bathroom, 1 toilette, bedding, individually controlled heating/cooling. Full kitchen with TV, refrigerator, oven, stovetop, microwave, coffee maker, milk frother, kettle, toaster, and complete dinnerware. Weekly cleaning service included, additional cleaning on request for a fee. Bright, spacious, and comfortable spaces. Includes large shared patio.
